The Diner

Douglas Richardson finds HIMSELF trapped physically and mentally in this Twilight-Zone-esque psychological thriller set in the 1950's.

The Diner was a finalist in the RØDE Reel 2014 International Film Contest.

  1. What did you just say?
  2. Please, make it stop!
  3. Let's see who you really are!
  4. Welcome to Mickey's Diner (unused)
  5. End Credits
